Title: Staff ML / AI Engineer
Description:
Choco is on a mission to enable the global food system to become sustainable by optimizing the way food is sold, ordered, distributed, and financed. Our AI-focused software connects distributors with their customers to operate waste-free and efficiently. A problem of this magnitude requires a massive scale and only the best people will be able to solve it. Are you in?

Here’s what we’re up to: https://bit.ly/4fyXonB

We are seeking a Staff Machine Learning Engineer ready to make a true impact.

At Choco we went within 16 months from 0 AI revenue to AI driving 100% of our new revenue. We took AI seriously, not for window dressing, but to bring us to our vision faster and to drive a significant part of our revenue. Because only when AI drives a majority of revenue is it at the core of the company.

We have assembled an absolutely world-class AI team that you will be working with. We work with cutting-edge tech and are an innovation driver in our industry and the broader European ecosystem.

You’ll need to be at the forefront of applied AI research and development, staying on top of industry advancements and constantly seeking ways to improve, validate, and deploy the latest models effectively. You must be an exceptional applied researcher with the ability to turn complex AI technologies into scalable, reliable systems in production. Excellence in engineering skills is a must, as you will be responsible for ensuring our AI models run efficiently, can scale, and meet the rigorous demands of our platform.

We’re looking for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, high-execution environment—someone who can learn quickly, adapt to new technologies, take ownership and deliver impactful solutions. You will collaborate with an amazing team, working alongside peers, engineers, and other experts to help us realize our ambitious vision. If you have a passion for AI, the drive to innovate, and the engineering skills to execute at the highest level, we want to hear from you.

Our current tech stack includes AWS serverless stack, Databricks + mlflow, Kubernetes, Kafka, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, Elastic Cloud, the newest models from different vendors incl. OpenAI, Python with common libraries and frameworks. For data transformations, we primarily use SQL, dbt & PySpark.

What You’ll Be Doing

We move fast. We commit to delivering user increments and advancing research on a weekly basis. Team members rotate between a variety of challenging problems. One week, you might be validating hypotheses and assumptions, demonstrating your conclusions in a defendable and reproducible way. The next week, you could be building a proof of concept, and in the third, you'll be shipping the first iteration of your work directly to our users.


Drive Choco's technical AI vision, roadmap, and projects alongside the rest of Data and Engineering leadership
Lead end-to-end development of AI and ML systems, incl. experimentation, deployment, optimization and monitoring
Collaborate with and be part of cross-functional teams to integrate sophisticated models into our systems
Carry the team through support, coaching, feedback, tooling, documentation, establishing best practices and knowledge sharing
Develop innovative solutions for complex business challenges


Your Responsibilities


Articulate a vision and long-term roadmap for AI at Choco, outlining immediate actionable steps to achieve it.
Understand and interpret complex business and customer challenges, translating them into actionable AI solutions.
Ensure AI systems are scalable, efficient, and effective.
This role requires you to be hands-on. You are expected to contribute to our codebase on a daily basis
Lead by example, demonstrating a strong work ethic, quick iterations, and a commitment to continuous delivery. Embrace and drive Choco's ambitious goals, thriving in a fast-paced, challenging startup environment.
Employ an agile approach, emphasizing swift delivery, responsiveness to feedback, and continuous improvement.


What We’re Looking For


Technical Leadership: You can think two, three steps ahead while not losing sight of what is important today. You have had demonstrable influence and impact on the success of the products you have worked on.
Expertise with LLMs: Hands-on experience with state-of-the-art language models like GPT-4, including safely deploying them in production environments. Familiarity with applications and architectures involving conversational agents, fine-tuning, and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).
Search and Recommendations: Proven expertise in building personalized search and recommendation systems, with a deep understanding of information retrieval and natural language processing (NLP) challenges like Named Entity Recognition (NER).
Engineering Excellence: Strong programming and engineering skills, with the ability to design, build, and maintain scalable AI systems.
Communication and Collaboration: Clear, effective communication skills, with the ability to translate complex AI concepts into practical, actionable solutions for cross-functional teams.
Startup Mindset: Experience in fast-paced environments, with the ability to navigate ambiguity, take ownership of projects, and - most importantly - get shit done


At Choco, we're experiencing rapid growth and leading the AI revolution in the food supply chain. Our industry-leading Choco AI solution has achieved strong product-market fit, demonstrating the impact of our innovative approach. As a data scientist here, you'll work end-to-end, from conducting deep-dive analyses to building and deploying production-ready ML and AI systems. Join us in our mission to transform the industry through cutting-edge technology and relentless innovation.

Choco was founded in 2018 in Berlin. Now, we are a dedicated team of over 200 Chocorians across Europe and the US. We seek hungry and humble individuals who embrace hard work, put our team first, and are committed to building a lasting company. Our mission demands urgency and speed while maintaining a long-term vision.

In just five years, Choco has raised $328.5 million and achieved unicorn status in 2022, with a valuation of $1.2 billion. We're supported by some of the world’s best investors like Bessemer Venture Partners, Insight Partners, Coatue Management, and LeftLane Capital.

Choco is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Title: Software Engineering Consultant (2024/25 Graduate)
Description:
Come work with us




Netlight strives to be a truly diverse, equitable and inclusive organization. Regardless of who you are, what personality, background, and experience you have, you enrich our culture through your values. Netlight’s purpose is to unleash full potential, realize great careers, and fulfill personal growth. To achieve this, we have a highly engaged network organization, where every employee gets a mentor, delivery coach and personal communities. The key to our continued success is trust and personal responsibility, diverse experiences, challenging opportunities and developing from personal values. Every Netlighter is an active part of building and shaping this culture, which leads to a clear correlation between personal growth and the growth of Netlight.







About us




Netlight provides a full range of premium IT-consulting services at the forefront of the digital industry and stands out for its product- and technology-independent expertise in a wide range of industries and clients. We are a network organization of more than 2 000 role models making aspiring digital leaders successful in their business-critical IT projects. Netlight has been awarded several times as top employer, as well as for growth, continued profitability and engagement for diversity, equity and equality within the IT industry. Today we are growing all across Europe, currently with more than 10 active international offices.







What does it mean to be an IT Consultant in Software Engineering at Netlight?




Join the Netlight Berlin team as a consultant and be a part of shaping the software products and technical solutions of today and tomorrow alongside your colleagues and clients. Our focus is not just on the digital product, but also on the team and the business. You'll have the ownership to carve your own career path, choosing from a range of clients and roles based on your personal experience, strengths, interests, and market demand. With opportunities in Fullstack, Backend, Frontend, Web Development, System Development, Cloud, Mobile Development, Architecture, Data Engineering, DevOps, Infrastructure, Scrum Master, Agile Coaching, and Product Owner, the possibilities are endless. Come build the future with us at Netlight.







Minimum Qualifications




Master’s Degree in Computer Science, IT, Technology or similar & freshly graduated (e.g. 2024/25)
Verbal and written proficiency in English
Working student and/or internship experience in agile software engineering roles
Based in Berlin or willingness to relocate to Berlin (or see other open Netlight job ads) - no travelling required!







DON’T BE SHY – GET IN TOUCH WITH US!




If we find that your profile matches what we are looking for, you will hear from us within two weeks of applying.




We're looking forward to hearing from you!

Title: Senior Machine Learning Scientist for DocAI
Description:
Senior Machine Learning Scientist for DocAI (m/w/d)

DKB AG

Standort: Berlin

unbefristet

Teil- & Vollzeit möglich

ab sofort

Deine Aufgaben


Leistungsfähige Services auf Basis von Foundation Models und klassischer ML entwickeln und zielgerichtet für Dokumentenextraktion einsetzen
End-to-End-Verantwortung für die Entwicklung der ML-basierten Services vom Proof of Concept bis zum produktiven System übernehmen.
Ideen im Austausch mit Fachkolleg*innen entwickeln und neue Einsatzgebiete für generative KI erschließen.
Deine Kenntnisse regelmäßig erweitern und die jeweils besten verfügbaren Methoden für die Modellentwicklung einsetzen.
In einem schnell wachsenden Team deine Skills ausbauen und einbringen.


Dein Profil


Ein abgeschlossenes Studium der Mathematik, Physik, (Wirtschafts-)Informatik oder eines anderen quantitativen Studiengangs
Fundierte Python-Kenntnisse mit mind. 3 Jahren praktischer Erfahrung
Erfahrung mit Cloud-Diensten (AWS, Azure) und cloudbasierten AI Services mit Bezug zur Dokumentenanalyse und Informationsextraktion
Tiefes Verständnis von Machine-Learning-Modellen im Allgemeinen sowie vertiefte Kenntnisse im Bereich Foundation Models
Prägnante und strukturierte Ausdrucksweise
Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse


Die DKB steht für Vielfalt und Chancengerechtigkeit. Egal, woher du kommst, wie alt du bist, welches Geschlecht, welche Genderidentität, sexuelle Orientierung oder Religion du hast, ob mit oder ohne Behinderung - wir freuen uns auf deine Bewerbung!

Deine Benefits und mehr


Attraktive Vergütung (tariflich oder außertariflich)
Flexibles und mobiles Arbeiten – temporär auch im EU-Ausland
Du hast die Wahl: Benefits Pass, Jobticket oder Jobrad
Moderne Technik- ausstattung und Tool Stack
Individuelle Qualifi- zierungsmöglichkeiten
Duz-Kultur und kein Dresscode
Externe Mitarbeitenden- beratung
Angebote zum Gesundbleiben
Weitere Extras wie z.B. betriebliche Altersvorsorge und Versicherungsschutz


Immer für dich ansprechbar

Oleg Chapaykin

Expertise Lead

oleg.chapaykin@dkb.de

Deutsche Kreditbank AG

Du möchtest mehr zur DKB erfahren?

Dann schau auf unserer Karriereseite vorbei.

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (m/f/d)
Description:
About The Opportunity

Become part of the Ninetailed Team, pioneer of composable personalization and experimentation within the Contentful family.

At Ninetailed by Contentful, you will revolutionize personalization & experimentation for leading businesses worldwide. As a Senior ML Engineer, you will bring a fleet of models to production and operate them at scale. Your work will enable our customers to deliver the right content to the right people in a data-driven way.

What to expect?


Bring models from idea to production with a focus on models for predictive analytics
Optimize ML models for accuracy, speed, and scalability
Integrate ML cloud solutions and adapt them to our large-scale use cases
Continuously monitor and optimize existing models through benchmarking
Collaborate closely with Data Engineers and Data Scientists to drive the technical roadmap for upcoming ML solutions
Drive the ML education in the team and establish a high standard of quality & ownership
Stay up to date with the latest technologies and constantly evaluate their potential
Guarantee correctness and maintainable code through automated testing


What You Need To Be Successful


Proven track record in model development of a wide range of ML models
Hands-on experience with running production ML workloads at scale
Familiarity with distributed systems and cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)
Experience with container frameworks such as Docker and Kubernetes
Industry experience in A/B testing, attribution modeling and predictive analytics is beneficial
Great communication skills in English, especially when explaining complex technical concepts


What’s in it for you?


Join an ambitious tech company reshaping the way people build digital experiences
Full-time employees receive Stock Options for the opportunity to share in the success of our company
Fertility and family building benefits, including a lifetime reimbursable wallet to support your growing family.
We value Work-Life balance and You Time! A generous amount of paid time off, including vacation days, sick days, education days, compassion days for loss, and volunteer days
Use your personal annual education budget to improve your skills and grow in your career
Enjoy a full range of virtual and in-person events, including workshops, guest speakers, and fun team activities, supporting learning and networking exchange beyond the usual work duties
An annual wellbeing stipend to care for your physical, financial, or emotional health
A monthly communication phone/internet stipend and phone hardware upgrade reimbursement.
New hire office equipment stipend for hybrid or distributed employees. Get the gear you need to work at your best.


Who are we?

Contentful is the intelligent composable content platform that unlocks all of an organization’s digital content to deliver impactful customer experiences, making content a strategic business asset. The Contentful Platform, Contentful Studio, and the Contentful Ecosystem combine the flexibility of composable content with the intelligence of AI, empowering digital teams to drive business momentum through collaboration, speed, and scale. Contentful powers innovative content experiences across brands, regions, and channels for organizations around the world, including nearly 30% of the Fortune 500. Nearly 800 people from more than 70 nations contribute their energy and creativity to Contentful, working from hubs in Berlin, Denver and distributed around the world.

Everyone is welcome here!

“Everyone is welcome here” is a celebrated component of our culture. At Contentful, we strive to create an inclusive environment that empowers our employees. We believe that our products and services benefit from our diverse backgrounds and experiences and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applications will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, age, physical [dis]ability, or length of time spent unemployed. We invite you to apply and join us!

If you need reasonable accommodations at any point during the application or interview process, please let your recruiting coordinator know.

Please be aware of scammers who may fraudulently allege to be from Contentful. These types of fraud can be carried out through copycat websites, fake email addresses claiming to be from our company, or social media. We do not ask for your personal information such as bank account numbers, identification numbers, etc through social media or chat-based apps, nor do we request or send money for the purchase of business equipment. If you suspect fraud, please report it to your local authorities, as well as reaching out to us at security-esk@contentful.com with any information you may have.

By clicking “Apply for this job,” I acknowledge that I have read the “Contentful’s Candidate Privacy Notice”, and hereby consent to the collection, processing, use, and storage of my personal information as described therein.

Title: AI Engineer (LLM)
Description:
At Synthflow.ai, we're making AI accessible to everyone, regardless of technical skills or coding experience. Our platform allows our B2B clients to build sophisticated, tailored AI Voice agents.

We are now seeking a talented and passionate AI Developer to join our innovative team and lead the product development, research, and technical architecture for our new AI-powered platform. This is a hands-on role that will allow you to play a key part in shaping the future of AI.

Your Responsibilities


Research, design the architecture and implement new AI-powered features.
Implement those features together with the engineering team
Develop and maintain the backend infrastructure, ensuring scalability, performance, and reliability.
Participate in the entire software development lifecycle, including requirements analysis, design, implementation, testing, and deployment of AI features.
Research and implement new AI technologies, frameworks, and tools to enhance the platform capabilities.
Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members to maintain code quality and best practices.
Stay up-to-date with the latest AI and software development trends, sharing knowledge with the team and actively contributing to continuous improvement.


You have


Experience as a Python developer minimum 5 years
Experience in building data infrastructure that is both scalable and extensible
Experience in infrastructure containerization and DevOps & MLOps on (GCP or AWS)
Experience in building and maintaining enterprise-grade API’s (e.g. with fastAPI)
Knowledge hunger about AI and LMMs and desire make Agents accessible to Businesses and Developers
Builder mindset and enjoy to tinker around and experiment with complex systems


Bonus:


Experience working with and fine-tuning Large Language Models (LLMs)
Experience with low-latency audio stream processing
Experience building production-grade applications with LLMs and using frameworks such as LangChain, LlamaIndex, etc.
Experience with large-scale distributed compute and cloud infrastructure


🚀 Why Build Your Career at Synthflow AI?


Competitive Compensation: Every engineer on our team receives a comprehensive compensation package that includes stock options, ensuring you share in our collective success.
Direct Impact & Ownership: As an integral part of our engineering team, you’ll have the autonomy to shape innovative projects from the ground up. Your work will directly influence the future of voice AI technology in a well-funded startup environment.
Cutting-Edge Technology: Join us in driving the next wave of advancements in the AI no-code space. You'll work on pioneering projects that revolutionize how users interact with technology through voice and language AI.
Collaborative Team Culture: At Synthflow, we value input from all team members and believe that everyone’s contribution is vital to our success. You'll be part of a team that embraces innovation and mutual respect.
Remote-First Flexibility: We are committed to a remote-first approach, allowing you to work from anywhere while contributing to projects that have a global impact. Our headquarters are in Berlin, Germany, but your role can be performed from anywhere in the world.
Show more
HTML:
At Synthflow.ai, we're making AI accessible to everyone, regardless of technical skills or coding experience. Our platform allows our B2B clients to build sophisticated, tailored AI Voice agents.

We are now seeking a talented and passionate AI Developer to join our innovative team and lead the product development, research, and technical architecture for our new AI-powered platform. This is a hands-on role that will allow you to play a key part in shaping the future of AI.

Your Responsibilities

  • Research, design the architecture and implement new AI-powered features.
  • Implement those features together with the engineering team
  • Develop and maintain the backend infrastructure, ensuring scalability, performance, and reliability.
  • Participate in the entire software development lifecycle, including requirements analysis, design, implementation, testing, and deployment of AI features.
  • Research and implement new AI technologies, frameworks, and tools to enhance the platform capabilities.
  • Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members to maintain code quality and best practices.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest AI and software development trends, sharing knowledge with the team and actively contributing to continuous improvement.

You have

  • Experience as a Python developer minimum 5 years
  • Experience in building data infrastructure that is both scalable and extensible
  • Experience in infrastructure containerization and DevOps & MLOps on (GCP or AWS)
  • Experience in building and maintaining enterprise-grade API’s (e.g. with fastAPI)
  • Knowledge hunger about AI and LMMs and desire make Agents accessible to Businesses and Developers
  • Builder mindset and enjoy to tinker around and experiment with complex systems

Bonus:

  • Experience working with and fine-tuning Large Language Models (LLMs)
  • Experience with low-latency audio stream processing
  • Experience building production-grade applications with LLMs and using frameworks such as LangChain, LlamaIndex, etc.
  • Experience with large-scale distributed compute and cloud infrastructure

🚀 Why Build Your Career at Synthflow AI?

  • Competitive Compensation: Every engineer on our team receives a comprehensive compensation package that includes stock options, ensuring you share in our collective success.
  • Direct Impact & Ownership: As an integral part of our engineering team, you’ll have the autonomy to shape innovative projects from the ground up. Your work will directly influence the future of voice AI technology in a well-funded startup environment.
  • Cutting-Edge Technology: Join us in driving the next wave of advancements in the AI no-code space. You'll work on pioneering projects that revolutionize how users interact with technology through voice and language AI.
  • Collaborative Team Culture: At Synthflow, we value input from all team members and believe that everyone’s contribution is vital to our success. You'll be part of a team that embraces innovation and mutual respect.
  • Remote-First Flexibility: We are committed to a remote-first approach, allowing you to work from anywhere while contributing to projects that have a global impact. Our headquarters are in Berlin, Germany, but your role can be performed from anywhere in the world.

Fine-tuning and deploying large language models (LLMs).
End-to-end implementation of LLM-based solutions, from training to deployment.

Proficiency in English (German is a plus).
Proven experience with LLMs and AI-driven solutions.

Title: Software Engineer AI (all genders welcome)
Description:
Software Engineer AI

Das macht Dich anders.

Wir sind auf einer Wellenlänge, wenn Du:


smarte Entscheidungen triffst. Du musst nicht immer die richtigen Entscheidungen treffen, aber immer mit bestem Gewissen gegenüber unseren Kunden, Kolleg*innen und COSMO entscheiden.
den Menschen bei all Deinen Überlegungen in den Mittelpunkt stellst. Du achtest auf die Bedürfnisse aller Menschen und agierst mit Empathie und Mitgefühl.
Verantwortung übernimmst. Du bist achtsam gegenüber Dir und Deinen Mitmenschen. Auf Dich kann man sich auch über Deinen Aufgabenbereich hinaus verlassen.
uns dabei unterstützt, großartige Teams zu bilden. Alle für Dich und Du für alle - gemeinsam stärker sein. Du machst den Unterschied in Deinem Team.
immer Dein Bestes gibst. Du musst nicht der oder die Beste sein, aber aus tiefstem Respekt gegenüber Dir und Deinem Umfeld immer das Bestmögliche geben.
den Mut hast zu wachsen. Du denkst nicht in Herausforderungen, sondern in Möglichkeiten. Du liebst es, Dich weiter zu entwickeln, suchst nach neuen Ideen und bringst diese aktiv ein.
Dinge mit Leidenschaft tust. Du weißt, was Dich antreibt und begeistert, lebst Deine Leidenschaft, inspirierst dadurch Dein Umfeld, hast mehr Spaß an Deiner Arbeit und bist erfolgreicher.


Deine Persönlichkeit und Motivation ist das, was Dich ausmacht.

Daher nehmen wir uns die Zeit und schauen alle Bewerbungen individuell durch.

In Your Job:


You will independently develop and implement AI projects for the AI Center of Excellence and Innovation Lab, ensuring your work style prevents blockers for the team.
You will optimize workflows through automation, build integrations for existing systems, and clearly communicate work progress so the team can coordinate effectively.
You will drive the implementation of modern AI technologies, making informed decisions for RAG, argenic and prompt-architectures using tools like LangChain/LangGraph, Vercel AI SDK, and pgvector to balance cost, performance, and maintainability.
You will introduce and leverage advanced development tools and frameworks such as Next.js, tRPC, Cursor.com, and PostgreSQL to establish a solid foundation for production-ready AI applications.
You will collaborate with your team to adopt LLM best practices, such as context window management, fine-tuning, and prompt engineering, to maximize application performance and minimize costs.


For a "perfect match," you need:


Solid experience with TypeScript, and modern frameworks like Next.js, Tailwind, and tRPC.
Comprehensive knowledge of LLM models (e.g., GPT, Claude), vector databases (e.g., Pinecone), and tools supporting rapid AI development (e.g., Cursor, v0, bolt, windsurf).
Proficiency in applying LLM best practices, including managing context windows, fine-tuning, prompt engineering and managing context windows.
A self-responsible work style and strong communication skills to ensure smooth team collaboration and prevent roadblocks.
A deep understanding of modern AI technologies (RAG, LangChain/LangGraph, Vercel AI SDK, pgvector) and the ability to make informed decisions impacting cost, performance, and scalability.
Du entscheidest wann und wo, damit es für Dich, Dein Team und Deinen Arbeitstag am besten passt.
Auf Deiner Reise bist Du nicht allein. Durch unser Level Up Programm gestalten wir Deine berufliche Zukunft gemeinsam.
Wir fragen nicht ob, sondern wie. Unsere Innovation Challenge und die Trainings in unserem COSMO College sind nur einige Beispiele dafür.
Es ist uns wichtig, dass es Dir gut geht. Das bringen wir durch verschiedene Wege und Benefits zum Ausdruck.
Wir kümmern uns um Mensch und Umwelt. Mit #thepowerofpeople schaffen wir einen sicheren Raum für eine positive, nachhaltige und internationale Zusammenarbeit.


Du möchtest Teil des Teams werden?

Dann bewirb Dich mit Deinen aussagefähigen Bewerbungsunterlagen und Deinem frühestmöglichen Eintrittsdatum direkt online.

Du möchtest mehr #insideCOSMO?


Show more

Title: Senior/Principal Applied Scientist
Description:
The Discovery team assists customers in their fashion discovery journey and helps them find what they are looking for. We are developing the next generation of our discovery systems, utilizing state-of-the-art natural language processing (NLP) and/or information retrieval (IR) methods, particularly transformer-based deep neural networks and large language models (LLMs).

As a Senior or Principal Applied Scientist (we are flexible to consider different level of experience) you will play a key role in addressing challenging fashion problems using cutting-edge approaches. You will help drive our scientific roadmap, applying your scientific capabilities to deliver department-wide and cross-department projects in collaboration with multiple teams. Working closely with Zalando science leaders, you will guide a team of exceptional scientists and engineers to develop models and cutting-edge machine learning products that enhance the experience of over 51 million customers.

What We'd Love You To Do (and Love Doing)



Utilize your extensive scientific experience in researching, deploying, and architecting machine learning and deep learning solutions in IR to enhance the inspiration journey of millions of our customers. Collaborate with multiple teams to create a cutting-edge science stack that aligns with the product strategy and drive architectural and design principles.
Develop long-term scientific roadmaps to address complex fashion challenges using state-of-the-art solutions, ensuring we stay at the forefront of IR innovation. Contribute to our scientific endeavors through internal peer reviews and external publications in top-tier journals and conferences.
Act as a mentor to junior and senior scientists, foster collaboration with other teams, and actively share knowledge and expertise within Zalando’s science community.
Forge close partnerships with applied science leaders, product managers, and other business stakeholders to deliver state-of-the-art machine learning solutions to our customers and uncover new opportunities for growth.




WE'D LOVE TO MEET YOU IF




PhD in IR, search & recommendation, information & knowledge management, or related fields (or equivalent experience), accompanied by 6+ years of industry experience in modern IR systems, especially neural IR. Comprehensive understanding of the key components of an IR system, including query processing, indexing, evaluation, etc.
Experience in developing long-term research roadmaps and applying scientific methods to tackle research problems. A strong inclination to collaborate with product, science, and engineering managers and solve business problems through scientific solutions.
Extensive track record of addressing large-scale real-world problems using machine learning throughout the entire product cycle, encompassing problem analysis, data processing, literature review, production deployment, monitoring, and maintenance.
Strong publication records at top-tier venues such as SIGIR, KDD, WWW, ICLR, NeurIPS, ICML, JMLR, etc.
Extensive hands-on experience in deep learning with proficiency in Python and frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow. Familiarity with LLMs. Proficiency in full-text search engines such as Elasticsearch, OpenSearch, Apache Lucene is also desired.
Knowledge of classical IR models is a plus (boolean, vector, and probabilistic).




INCLUSIVE BY DESIGN


At Zalando, our vision is to be inclusive by design. And this vision starts with our hiring - we do not discriminate on the basis of gender identity, sexual orientation, personal expression, ethnicity, religious belief, or disability status. You are welcome to leave out your picture, age, or marital status from your application. We only assess candidates on their qualifications and merit.

We want to provide you with a great candidate experience. Feel free to inform us of any accommodations you may need, so we can best support you throughout the hiring process.

do.BETTER - our diversity & inclusion strategy https //corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/dobetter-our-diversity-and-inclusion-strategy

Our employee resource groups https //corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/our-employee-resource-groups


OUR OFFER


Zalando provides a range of benefits, here’s an overview of what you can expect. Ask your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about what we offer.



Employee shares program
40% off fashion and beauty products sold and shipped by Zalando, 30% off Zalando Lounge, discounts from external partners
2 paid volunteering days a year
Hybrid working model with 60% (or more) remote per week, actual practice is up to each team to best support their collaboration
Work from abroad for up to 30 working days a year
27 days of vacation a year (for Zalando SE)
Relocation assistance available (subject to prior agreement)
Family services, including counseling and support
Health and wellbeing options (including Gympass)
Mental health support and coaching available



Learn all about Zalando and our values here https //jobs.zalando.com/en/?gh_src=22377bdd1us

Title: Machine Learning Engineer, MLOps/MLaaS, Engine AI Center of Excellence
Description:
Description

Our team builds data-driven automation capabilities to support critical service operations in Retail and IT with global impact. Automation improves the operations and availability of consumer services with a positive impact on millions of users every year. We leverage off the sciences of data and information processing to build tooling and machine learning capabilities. Our work contributes to increase service operation resilience and enables us to act ahead of service disruptions, while simplifying system and information complexity.

As a Machine Learning Engineer of the AICE team, you have an important role in implementing and operating end-to-end machine learning and data processing pipelines that integrate with our partners production systems. You work in synergy with our applied scientists, data scientists, machine learning engineers, and partners, to design machine learning models and evaluation experiments at scale.

You are well familiar to all aspects of practical machine learning, encompassing sound use of data preprocessing techniques, analysis, modelling (e.g., neural networks, regression, estimators, probabilistic models, etc.), hyper-parameter tuning approaches, and validation methods. In addition, you demonstrate excellent software development engineering skills that you use daily for designing computationally effective solutions and for machine learning operations (MLOps) in large scale production environments.

Key job responsibilities

You design model experimentation in synergy with our scientists. You own the development and operationalization of solutions deployed in production. You work across multiple teams to integrate our solutions with products owned by our partners. You help the team grow and cultivate best practices in software development, MLOps, and experimentation.

A day in the life

Almost everyday offers new challenges and opportunities for growth. Where one day will offer implementation of experimentation tooling, the next day may be focused on our operational excellence in maintaining our code base. Later in the week, you may sort technical challenges with our partners to help them enrich their products with our models. On some days or weeks, you may watch over our products and stand ready to intervene and provide support to partners consuming our models.

About The Team

We work back to back to address the technical challenges of automation across a variety of products, software, and systems. Our scientists and machine learning engineers work in synergy to solve hard problems and enrich each other's skills. Together, we are a powerful team of specialists that bring the potential of practical machine learning to the max with impact on millions of Amazon customers.

Basic Qualifications


Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent
Experience (non-internship) in professional software development
Experience designing or architecting (design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and existing systems
Experience programming with at least one software programming language
Experience in Machine Learning Operations (MLOps) in deploying, operationalizing, and maintaining scalable AI/ML-solutions in production.


Preferred Qualifications


Master's degree in computer science or equivalent
Experience with full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations
Experience in machine learning, data mining, information retrieval, statistics or natural language processing


Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

m/w/d

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.


Company - Amazon Development Center Germany GmbH

If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.


Company - Amazon Development Center Germany GmbH

Job ID: A2871535

Title: Senior Applied Scientist (all genders)
Description:
THE ROLE & THE TEAM

Where will Partner Platform's commercial growth come from? Where do our partners have the highest potential to grow their business? Are we investing enough to engage our partners? How do our partners react to the strategic actions we take on them? How are our customers impacted by these changes? These are among the most important questions at Zalando Partner Platform today. The Partner Service Economics team is looking for innovative, passionate, and results-oriented Applied Scientist to answer these questions. You will have the opportunity to contribute to the long-run outlook for Zalando’s Partner Platform business and help make strategic decisions at the highest level. The successful candidate will be able to formalize problem definitions, build models using Zalando’s tech setup systems, and develop cutting-edge solutions for non-standard problems. As a Senior Applied Scientist, you will also coach less experienced team members by sharing best practices in problem-solving, modeling, and soft skills.

INCLUSIVE BY DESIGN

We only assess candidates based on qualifications, merit, and business needs. We welcome applications from people of all gender identities, sexual orientations, personal expressions, racial identities, ethnicities, religious beliefs, and disability statuses. We only want to know why you’re great for this role, so please avoid including your picture, age, and marital status in your CV as well.

We want to provide you with a great candidate experience. Please feel free to inform us of any accommodations you may need, so we can best support and assist you throughout the hiring process.

do.BETTER - our diversity & inclusion strategy https //corporate.zalando.com/en/diversity-inclusion

Our employee resource groups https //corporate.zalando.com/en/diversity-inclusion/our-employee-resource-groups

What We'd Love You To Do (and Love Doing)



Develop new forecasting models or improve existing approaches using scalable techniques.
Extract data for analysis and model development from large, complex datasets to explain demand trends.
Closely work with other applied science and engineering teams to build/reuse scalable, efficient systems that implement prototypes in production.
Refine problem definitions from informal business requirements and communicate technical solutions to senior business leaders.
Drive innovation and best practices in applied research across Zalando's research community.



WE'D LOVE TO MEET YOU IF



Experience with applied time series modeling, causal inference, or machine learning forecasting commercial metrics specifically in the application of platform economy, scenario-based forecasting, capital allocation and budget modelling.
Excellent knowledge of machine learning and statistical measures, such as confidence intervals, significance of error measurements, development and evaluation of data sets, etc. with a proven track record in addressing real-world problems using empirical science.
3+ years of experience with data querying languages (e.g. SQL), scripting languages (e.g. Python) or statistical/mathematical software (e.g. PyGAM, Statsmodel, Octave, Matlab, etc.)
Experience applying theoretical models in an applied environment
Experience with Databricks and Spark is a plus.



OUR OFFER



Zalando provides a range of benefits, here’s an overview of what you can expect. Ask your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about what we offer.
Employee shares program
40% off fashion and beauty products sold and shipped by Zalando, 30% off Zalando Lounge, discounts from external partners
2 paid volunteering days a year
Hybrid working model, with flexible hours and up to 60% remote
Work from abroad for up to 30 working days a year
27 days of vacation a year to start
Relocation assistance available (subject to prior agreement)
Family services, including counselling and support
Health and wellbeing options (including Gympass)
Mental health support and coaching available



About Zalando

It’s the perfect time to join Zalando on our journey, from being a pioneer in the world of e-commerce, to the starting point for fashion in Europe. We connect customers, brands, and partners across 23 markets.

Help us drive digital and sustainable solutions for fashion, logistics, advertising and research, bringing head-to-toe fashion to more than 48 million active customers through a team of diverse skill-sets, cultural backgrounds, and interests.

Our values https //jobs.zalando.com/en/our-founding-mindset

do.More - our sustainability strategy https //corporate.zalando.com/en/sustainability

Follow us on Instagram instagram.com/insidezalando

Please note that all applications must be completed using the online form - we do not accept applications via email.

Title: VIE _ Data Scientist en tarification et marketing (H/F) _ ALLEMAGNE
Description:
Contexte et environnement

Vérifiez votre éligibilité au programme ainsi que les spécificités pays sur le site internet https://mon-vie-via.businessfrance.fr/qu-est-ce-que-le-volontariat-international .

Merci de candidater en anglais !

Activités

Rejoignez notre filialeTotalEnergies Marketing Deutschland basée à Berlin !

Chez TotalEnergies, la division Lubrifiants, les stratégies de tarification et de marketing sont étroitement alignées dans un marché compétitif. La tarification est guidée par l'analyse du marché, le positionnement des produits et la comparaison avec la concurrence, tandis que les campagnes marketing mettent en avant les avantages des lubrifiants TotalEnergies pour renforcer les relations clients. Une approche collaborative et axée sur les données garantit que l'entreprise répond à la demande et maintient une forte présence de marque.

En tant que Data Scientist en tarification et marketing, vous travaillerez en étroite collaboration avec les équipes commerciales et marketing pour garantir la précision et la cohérence des données, en vous assurant que les résultats statistiques répondent aux objectifs commerciaux.

Vos principales missions seront les suivantes :

1/ Support en Tarification :


Assister dans l'analyse des stratégies de tarification en examinant les données historiques et les benchmarks concurrentiels
Utiliser des techniques statistiques pour identifier les tendances et les opportunités d'amélioration des prix.



2/ Analyse de la demande & Segmentation :


Analyser les tendances saisonnières et les préférences des clients pour adapter les campagnes
Utiliser des techniques de clustering et d'autres méthodes pour segmenter les clients et optimiser les efforts marketing
Suivre et rapporter les campagnes marketing, analyser le comportement des clients, et appliquer des modèles statistiques (par exemple, séries chronologiques, régression) pour prévoir la demande et optimiser l'allocation des ressources.



3/ Analyse Statistique & Reporting :


Appliquer des méthodes statistiques (par exemple, régression, tests d'hypothèses) pour analyser les données, prévoir les résultats et identifier des insights exploitables
Réaliser des tests A/B pour évaluer l'impact des stratégies marketing et de tarification.



Profil du candidat

Profil recherché :


Diplôme de Master en Commerce, Marketing, Economie, Statistiques, Data Science ou domaine connexe



Compétences techniques et savoir-être :


Compétences analytiques et axées sur les données, avec une connaissance de base des stratégies de marketing et de tarification
Compétences en utilisation d'outils de data science pour générer des insights exploitables
Capable de réfléchir de manière critique à l'impact de la tarification et du marketing sur le comportement des clients
Solide compréhension des techniques statistique (par exemple régression, tests A/B, prévisions)
Bonne connaissance en analyse marketing est un plus
Une certaine expérience en analyse de données, tarification, marketing ou intelligence économique est souhaitée



Compétences informatiques :


Maîtrise de Microsoft Office : Excel (niveau avancé)
Très bonnes connaissances de Power BI, R, Python pour l'analyse de données et la visualisation



Langues :


Allemand : niveau B2-
Anglais : niveau B2/C1
Français : niveau B2/C1



Informations supplémentaires

Start date : Q2 2025

TotalEnergies valorise la diversité, promeut le développement individuel et offre des opportunités d'emploi égales à tous les candidats.
Show more

TotalEnergies valorise la diversité, promeut le développement individuel et offre des opportunités d'emploi égales à tous les candidats.

Title: Backend & Cloud Engineer (2024/25 Graduate)
Description:
What does it mean to be an IT Consultant in Backend Development at Netlight?

Join the Netlight Berlin team as a consultant and be a part of shaping the software products and technical solutions of today and tomorrow alongside your colleagues and clients. Carve your career path, starting somewhere familiar and building from there.




Focus on the digital product, but also on the team and the business.
Create and scale existing and new products and companies and continuously learn and master a variety of technical tools.
Work on projects in fields such as Backend, DevOps, Infrastructure, Cloud, Web Development, System Development, Architecture, Fullstack, and more.




Preferred Qualifications

Master's Degree in Computer Science or Engineering and freshly graduated (e.g. 2024/25)




Minimum Qualifications

Working student and/or internship experience in agile software engineering roles
Verbal and written proficiency in English
Based in Berlin or willingness to relocate to Berlin (or see other open Netlight job ads) - no travelling required!




Come work with us

Netlight strives to be a truly diverse, equitable and inclusive organization. Regardless of who you are, what personality, background, and experience you have, you enrich our culture through your values. Netlight’s purpose is to unleash full potential, realize great careers, and fulfill personal growth. To achieve this, we have a highly engaged network organization, where every employee gets a mentor, delivery coach and personal communities. The key to our continued success is trust and personal responsibility, diverse experiences, challenging opportunities and developing from personal values. Every Netlighter is an active part of building and shaping this culture, which leads to a clear correlation between personal growth and the growth of Netlight.







About us

Netlight provides a full range of premium IT-consulting services at the forefront of the digital industry and stands out for its product- and technology-independent expertise in a wide range of industries and clients. We are a network organization of more than 2,000 role models making aspiring digital leaders successful in their business-critical IT projects. Netlight has been awarded several times as top employer, as well as for growth, continued profitability, and engagement for diversity, equity and equality within the IT industry. Today we are growing all across Europe, currently with more than 10 active international offices.




We are looking for newly graduated software developers with 1-2 years of relevant experience in tech projects. If we find that your profile matches what we are looking for, you will hear from us within two weeks of applying.




We're looking forward to hearing from you!

Title: Discoverability Specialist
Description:
Job Description

At Wolt, we’re on a mission to deliver seamless, innovative experiences for our customers worldwide. Enhancing our offering and optimizing customer experience are critical to our growth and the cornerstone of our business model's success. We’re looking for a Discoverability Specialist to focus on and improve key consumer performance metrics such as Average Basket Size and Conversion Rate. This position reports to the Sr. Manager - Discoverability in Consumer Business.

Your day-to-day activities will include the following areas:

Data Analysis


Analyze data from multiple sources, including Google Sheets and SQL databases.
Identify drivers, gaps, and opportunities to enhance our product experience and operations.
Use insights to prioritize new initiatives, address gaps, and highlight successful strategies.


Operational Execution


Execute and track operational projects that drive KPIs based on identified opportunities.
Design and deliver regular reporting on key performance drivers, surfacing reasons for current performance.
Collaborate with regional managers in the Consumer Business team to implement regional initiatives that improve discoverability.


Cross-Team Collaboration


Work closely with Product teams to create a shared vision and prioritize features that data indicates will have high impact.
Coordinate with teams such as Merchant and Retail to ensure a holistic approach to solving challenges and capitalizing on opportunities.
Collect and analyze business requirements across the organization.


Our humble expectations


3+ years of relevant experience as a Business Analyst, S&O, or a similar role.
Strong analytical skills with hands-on experience in tools like Google Sheets; SQL knowledge is a plus.
Proven ability to translate data into actionable insights that inform strategic decisions.
Experience in food delivery or related industries (such as e-commerce).
Exceptional communication and presentation skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across teams.
A proactive, hands-on attitude, with a willingness to dive into data and drive results.


Next Steps

If you are excited about working in a high-growth environment, taking ownership, and being part of an extremely ambitious team, then click below to apply and get the conversation going!

About Wolt

Wolt is a Helsinki-based technology company that provides an online platform for consumers, merchants and couriers. It connects people looking to order food and other goods with people interested in selling and delivering them. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local logistics to retail software and financial solutions – as well as operating its own grocery stores under the Wolt Market brand. Wolt’s products include Wolt+ (subscription service for customers), Wolt for Work (meal benefits and office deliveries for companies), Wolt Drive (fast last-mile deliveries for merchants) and Wolt Self-Delivery (service for merchant partners with their own delivery staff). Wolt’s mission is to make cities better by empowering and growing local communities. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 29 countries today, 25 of which are with the Wolt product and brand.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
KAYAK, part of Booking Holdings (NASDAQ: BKNG), is the world’s leading travel search engine. With billions of queries across our platforms, we help people find their perfect flight, stay, rental car and vacation package. We’re also transforming business travel with a new corporate travel solution, KAYAK for Business.

As an employee of KAYAK, you will be part of a travel company that operates a portfolio of global metasearch brands including momondo, Cheapflights and HotelsCombined, among others. From start-up to industry leader, innovation is in our DNA and every employee has an opportunity to make their mark. Our focus is on building the best travel search engine to make it easier for everyone to experience the world.

The Marketing Measurement team's mission is to improve KAYAK's ability to measure the efficiency of marketing efforts. This role works closely with marketing leaders to make better data-informed strategic marketing decisions.

As a Senior Data Scientist on this team, you will have the opportunity to develop the frameworks and roadmaps to tackle marketing measurement challenges in an efficient way, work with the stakeholders to align on priorities, and closely work your team to build the robust measurement and experimentation solutions!

In this role, you will:



Manage into end to end experimentation from formulating hypotheses, experiment design to collecting right data, doing power analysis to finally then implementing and analyzing experiment results
Support in the initiatives towards building a robust framework for efficiently creating and evaluating creative, bidding and landing page experiments
Develop new models and advanced analytics techniques to measure and optimize the marketing spend in a robust manner
Support the development of less senior scientists, collaborates with team members to assure timely delivery of high-quality work
Build standardized and scalable solutions, and lead from front in setting up the best practices



Please apply if you have:



Advanced degree (Masters, PhD) in Data Science, Statistics or a related field.
Extensive experience with data manipulation and extraction using relational databases (SQL)
Ability to write high quality, scalable, maintainable code (Python, R)
Strong story-telling and presentation skills to understand and communicate in the language of business partners, mostly within Marketing
Strong foundation in experimentation methods and causal inference techniques
Experienced in marketing science measurement methodologies like Causal impact, geo-lift on Google, and Marketing mix models
Proactive work style, needing minimal guidance and demonstrating good judgment
Has a keen sense of success criteria and demonstrates success through end-to-end QA. Independently adheres to strong testing and validation principles
Passionate about large data sets in marketing, finance, and economics. Skilled in paid marketing data, time-series analysis, econometrics, and regression models



Benefits:



Work from (almost) anywhere for up to 20 days per year
Focus on mental health and well-being:

Company-paid therapy sessions through SpringHealth
Company-paid subscription to HeadSpace
Company-wide week off a year - the whole team fully recharges (and returns without a pile-up of work!)
No meeting Fridays

Paid parental leave
Generous paid vacation + time off for your birthday
Paid volunteer time
Focus on your career growth:

Development Dollars
Leadership development
Access to thousand of on-demand e-learnings

Travel Discounts
Employee Resource Groups
6 weeks paid vacation
Free lunch 2 days per week
Pension plan contributions
Public transportation subsidies
Bike leasing program
Monthly social events, massages, Thursday happy hours, sports teams
An awesome office in Friedrichshain, Berlin


Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

At OpenTable/KAYAK, we aspire to be a workplace that fosters inclusion and reflects the diverse communities we serve. Hiring people with different backgrounds and perspectives is critical to innovation and to how we deliver great experiences for our users, partners, and teams. We strive to be an open and welcoming environment so that no matter who you are, you can be yourself.

We ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform job responsibilities, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request an accommodation(s).

As a Senior Data Scientist on this team, you will have the opportunity to develop the frameworks and roadmaps to tackle marketing measurement challenges in an efficient way, work with the stakeholders to align on priorities, and closely work your team to build the robust measurement and experimentation solutions!

In this role, you will:


  • Manage into end to end experimentation from formulating hypotheses, experiment design to collecting right data, doing power analysis to finally then implementing and analyzing experiment results
  • Support in the initiatives towards building a robust framework for efficiently creating and evaluating creative, bidding and landing page experiments
  • Develop new models and advanced analytics techniques to measure and optimize the marketing spend in a robust manner
  • Support the development of less senior scientists, collaborates with team members to assure timely delivery of high-quality work
  • Build standardized and scalable solutions, and lead from front in setting up the best practices


Please apply if you have:


  • Advanced degree (Masters, PhD) in Data Science, Statistics or a related field.
  • Extensive experience with data manipulation and extraction using relational databases (SQL)
  • Ability to write high quality, scalable, maintainable code (Python, R)
  • Strong story-telling and presentation skills to understand and communicate in the language of business partners, mostly within Marketing
  • Strong foundation in experimentation methods and causal inference techniques
  • Experienced in marketing science measurement methodologies like Causal impact, geo-lift on Google, and Marketing mix models
  • Proactive work style, needing minimal guidance and demonstrating good judgment
  • Has a keen sense of success criteria and demonstrates success through end-to-end QA. Independently adheres to strong testing and validation principles
  • Passionate about large data sets in marketing, finance, and economics. Skilled in paid marketing data, time-series analysis, econometrics, and regression models


Benefits:


  • Work from (almost) anywhere for up to 20 days per year
  • Focus on mental health and well-being:
    • Company-paid therapy sessions through SpringHealth
    • Company-paid subscription to HeadSpace
    • Company-wide week off a year - the whole team fully recharges (and returns without a pile-up of work!)
    • No meeting Fridays
  • Paid parental leave
  • Generous paid vacation + time off for your birthday
  • Paid volunteer time
  • Focus on your career growth:
    • Development Dollars
    • Leadership development
    • Access to thousand of on-demand e-learnings
  • Travel Discounts
  • Employee Resource Groups
  • 6 weeks paid vacation
  • Free lunch 2 days per week
  • Pension plan contributions
  • Public transportation subsidies
  • Bike leasing program
  • Monthly social events, massages, Thursday happy hours, sports teams
  • An awesome office in Friedrichshain, Berlin

Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

At OpenTable/KAYAK, we aspire to be a workplace that fosters inclusion and reflects the diverse communities we serve. Hiring people with different backgrounds and perspectives is critical to innovation and to how we deliver great experiences for our users, partners, and teams. We strive to be an open and welcoming environment so that no matter who you are, you can be yourself.

We ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform job responsibilities, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request an accommodation(s).

Title: AI Solutions Engineer (f/m/d)
Description:
Overview

We are seeking an AI Solutions Engineer (f/m/d) to drive the implementation of large language models and AI-driven solutions. You will collaborate with customers, engineering, and product teams to deliver tailored solutions, manage project schedules, and ensure seamless execution. With a focus on innovation, you will stay at the forefront of AI developments and translate complex technical concepts into actionable outcomes for diverse stakeholders.

Your Responsibilities


Prompt and finetune large language models
Facilitating customer evaluations and PoC
Develop and manage a detailed customer project schedule
Communicate innovative solutions to our customers and external partners
Understand customer requirements and translate them into project objectives
Stay on top of the latest AI developments to shape our vision at the intersection of market needs and innovation
Work directly with clients to understand their business goals and technical requirements
Draft and deliver presentations on targeted products, demonstrating features and functionality
Design, deploy, adapt, implement, configure, customize and test solutions for clients, fixing any regressions or challenges that may arise
Provide ongoing technical expertise or guidance and troubleshooting throughout a project's lifecycle to clients and stakeholders
Act as a link between technology and clients, translating complex technical concepts into easily understandable terms for non-technical stakeholders
Analyze situations, identify problems, and devise efficient solutions, often in time-critical scenarios
Work closely and trustfully with various departments, including sales, engineering, support, operations, IT, business groups, and end users and key users to ensure project success


Your Profile


You have experience with complex projects and managing their entire life-cycle 
You have fundamental knowledge of ML, and basic knowledge of AI and Large Language Models
Intermediate Skills in Python
Limited User Experience Design and User-centered approach of software solutions OR Limited Backend Systems Applications design
Good understanding of IT Applications and Architectures
Fundamental/Advanced Understanding of Machine Learning and AI
Experience working on customer-facing technical pre/post sales projects or solution implementation projects to enable customer's success
You have a solution-oriented mindset that helps you to solve problems creatively 
You can identify and implement high-impact processes in unstructured environments
Fluency in English is required; proficiency in German is highly preferred


What You Can Expect From Us


Become part of an AI revolution!
30 days of paid vacation
Access to a variety of fitness & wellness offerings via Wellhub
Mental health support through nilo.health
Substantially subsidized company pension plan for your future security
Subsidized Germany-wide transportation ticket
Budget for additional technical equipment
Flexible working hours for better work-life balance and hybrid working model
Virtual Stock Option Plan

Title: QA Engineer (Berlin)
Description:
Founded in 2001, Resident Advisor (RA) is one of the world's longest-running music media brands and a cornerstone of the dance, electronic and DJ ecosystem. The site's audience of over 6 million monthly users is drawn in by a combination of news, editorial, club listings and ticketing, RA-branded events at venues and festivals worldwide, original films and a weekly mix series that has run for 18 years.

As a QA Engineer, you'll be responsible for making sure our web and mobile apps (iOS and Android) are consistently good quality. You'll work within the Core Platform development team, reporting to the team lead.

To begin with, you'll be doing a combination of manual testing and running and debugging end-to-end tests to find bugs and regressions in releases. You'll be responsible for setting up test plans in combination with product and engineering and executing and reporting on any failures.

Your main responsibility however will be in moving towards an entirely automated testing process. This will consist of collaborating with engineers in other teams to design and implement new testing methodologies. It will also be about improving existing tooling and making the whole process more efficient and effective.

By setting up strong test frameworks and selecting the right tools, you'll be shaping the long-term quality strategy in product and development. This role is therefore also about embedding a culture of quality and high standards and ensuring that everyone works towards making every release reliable and performant.

Key responsibilities:


Start with manual testing for web applications and mobile apps (iOS and Android), then work towards building automated test suites
Ensure new features are properly tested, including functional, regression, and integration tests
Find and document bugs across web and mobile platforms, and work with the dev team to resolve them
Use tools like Selenium, Appium, Playwright, or similar to build and maintain automated test scripts
Continuously increase the automation coverage and improve testing processes
Work with developers, product managers, and stakeholders to keep everything running smoothly and maintain high-quality standards
Document test results clearly and share issues with the right teams
Help build a culture of quality in the team, ensuring that testing is always a priority
Always look for ways to improve QA processes, with a long-term goal of shifting to full automation
Stay current with new tools and testing methods, especially for mobile and web automation


We're looking for:


Solid experience as a QA Engineer or software tester, especially in web and mobile app testing (iOS and Android)
Comfortable starting with manual testing and developing towards automated testing
Hands-on experience with test automation tools like Selenium, Appium, and Playwright
Familiar with bug tracking systems and test case management
Basic knowledge of programming languages like Python, Java, or JavaScript for writing automated tests
Understanding of SQL for database checks and API testing tools like Postman
Good at finding and fixing bugs across web and mobile platforms
Attention to detail with a focus on producing high-quality results
Strong communication skills to work well with developers and other teams
Ability to clearly document and share test results and issues.


What we offer you:


Generous annual leave policies, including a company-wide closure period at year-end, aimed at promoting work-life balance
Flexibility in working arrangements, offering hybrid or remote work options based on role requirements and location.
Matching pension schemes and/or 401k
Comprehensive staff wellbeing initiatives, featuring regular activities and workplace programmes to support mental and physical health. This includes provisions such as Mental Health Days, subsidized therapy, discounted Classpass memberships, and custom-fitted earplugs
Company-led social events, team lunches, and discounts on RA merch
Paid annual volunteering allowance, encouraging contributions to community projects and charities you care about
Regular company-wide Q&A's with senior leadership, along with ongoing virtual educational training sessions for all staff
A transparent internal company culture committed to diversity, equity, and inclusion (see: https://ra.co/about/diversity).
Active involvement in community projects within the electronic music community (see: https://ra.co/about/community).


More about RA:

As an independent company run by devoted dance music enthusiasts, our mission is to bring together the world's electronic music communities. Our Global Contributor Network (GCN) and international teams help us establish connections with hyper-niche local scenes.

We became B-Corp certified earlier this year, which counts us among businesses leading a global movement for an inclusive, equitable, and regenerative economy; and part of a community that meets high social and environmental impact standards.

We especially welcome applicants from diverse backgrounds, abilities, ethnicities, experiences, gender identities, and sexual orientations. We aim for our team to reflect the communities we engage with. We ensure everyone is valued and respected by actively promoting equality, diversity, and inclusion in our workplace.

Our values:


Electronic music is art
We celebrate the progressive values that underpin electronic music
We advocate for a more inclusive and equitable electronic music community
We honour the past, present and future of electronic music
We use innovation to empower the community
We choose honesty over gain and purpose over profit
We're always front left


This role is a full-time and permanent position and the expected salary is €40,000 to €60,000. If you have questions about the role, please contact work@ra.co.

This listing will be open for a minimum of two weeks from the 3rd of February 2025. Please be sure to add work@ra.co to your contacts and check your junk/spam folder for emails from us.
Show more

Title: Fullstack Engineer - AI Feature Innovation
Description:
About The Opportunity

At Contentful, we empower thousands of customers to manage content at scale with speed, flexibility, and precision. We are seeking talented Fullstack Engineers (f/m/d) to join our AI Feature Innovation team—a group dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what’s possible with AI-driven content solutions.

As a Fullstack Engineer, you will play a crucial role in exploring and delivering AI-powered experiences that enhance the way customers author and interact with content. You’ll work on shipping cutting-edge AI-powered features, collaborating closely with designers, product managers, and engineers to shape the future of intelligent content management.

This role is perfect for an engineer who is excited about leveraging AI to solve real-world challenges, designing scalable systems, and building innovative customer-facing solutions. You will not only integrate existing AI technologies into Contentful but also develop new services and workflows that unlock new possibilities for content creation, personalization, and automation.

What to Expect


Innovate and Explore: Research, prototype and deliver new AI-powered end-to-end features, collaborating with stakeholders to identify opportunities to enhance the Contentful experience.
Fullstack Development: Design, develop, and maintain frontend and backend components using TypeScript, React, and Node.js, ensuring seamless AI feature integration.
AI Integration: Leverage AI models, APIs, and services to build intelligent automation, personalization, and content editing capabilities.
Service Design: Develop and integrate backend services that power AI-driven features, ensuring reliability, scalability, and efficiency.
Collaboration: Work closely with product managers, designers, and other engineers to ideate, experiment, and iterate on innovative solutions.
Performance & Optimization: Optimize AI-driven processes and ensure the solutions are performant, intuitive, and scalable for customers.
Stay Ahead of the Curve: Keep up with advancements in AI and AI-powered solutions and technologies to identify opportunities for innovation.


What you Need to be Successful


Full Stack Development: Proficiency in TypeScript, React, and Node.js with a solid understanding of clean code practices and exposure to enterprise architectural design patterns.
AI Enthusiasm: A passion for AI-driven innovation, with experience in integrating AI/ML APIs, models, or services into products.
API and Service Design: Demonstrated experience in developing APIs and services capable of handling moderate traffic efficiently.
Containerization and Orchestration: Hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes, particularly in deploying microservices.
Cloud Services Exposure: Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP, and experience with services like AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, or Azure App Services is a plus.
Curiosity and Problem-Solving: A self-starter who thrives on exploring new AI capabilities, testing new ideas, and solving complex challenges.
Collaboration & Adaptability: Strong communication skills and a proactive approach to working in a fast-paced, evolving environment.


Preferred


Experience developing AI-powered features in a product-driven environment.
Exposure to foundational AI models, prompt engineering, or other AI-powered content generation techniques.
Understanding of AI UX considerations and how to make AI-powered experiences intuitive and effective.


What's in it for you?


Join an ambitious tech company reshaping the way people build digital experiences
Full-time employees receive Stock Options for the opportunity to share in the success of our company
Fertility and family building benefits, including a lifetime reimbursable wallet to support your growing family.
We value Work-Life balance and You Time! A generous amount of paid time off, including vacation days, sick days, education days, compassion days for loss, and volunteer days
Use your personal annual education budget to improve your skills and grow in your career
Enjoy a full range of virtual and in-person events, including workshops, guest speakers, and fun team activities, supporting learning and networking exchange beyond the usual work duties
An annual wellbeing stipend to care for your physical, financial, or emotional health
A monthly communication phone/internet stipend and phone hardware upgrade reimbursement.
New hire office equipment stipend for hybrid or distributed employees. Get the gear you need to work at your best.


Who are we?

Contentful is the intelligent composable content platform that unlocks all of an organization’s digital content to deliver impactful customer experiences, making content a strategic business asset. The Contentful Platform, Contentful Studio, and the Contentful Ecosystem combine the flexibility of composable content with the intelligence of AI, empowering digital teams to drive business momentum through collaboration, speed, and scale. Contentful powers innovative content experiences across brands, regions, and channels for organizations around the world, including nearly 30% of the Fortune 500. Nearly 800 people from more than 70 nations contribute their energy and creativity to Contentful, working from hubs in Berlin, Denver and distributed around the world.

Everyone is welcome here!

“Everyone is welcome here” is a celebrated component of our culture. At Contentful, we strive to create an inclusive environment that empowers our employees. We believe that our products and services benefit from our diverse backgrounds and experiences and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applications will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, age, physical [dis]ability, or length of time spent unemployed. We invite you to apply and join us!

If you need reasonable accommodations at any point during the application or interview process, please let your recruiting coordinator know.

Please be aware of scammers who may fraudulently allege to be from Contentful. These types of fraud can be carried out through copycat websites, fake email addresses claiming to be from our company, or social media. We do not ask for your personal information such as bank account numbers, identification numbers, etc through social media or chat-based apps, nor do we request or send money for the purchase of business equipment. If you suspect fraud, please report it to your local authorities, as well as reaching out to us at security-esk@contentful.com with any information you may have.

By clicking “Apply for this job,” I acknowledge that I have read the “Contentful’s Candidate Privacy Notice”, and hereby consent to the collection, processing, use, and storage of my personal information as described therein.
